statements: DELETE FROM patient_medication_usage WHERE patient_id = 101 AND medication_id = 201
DELETE FROM patient_medication_usage WHERE patient_id = 101 AND medication_id = 201;
DELETE FROM patient_medication_usage WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
DELETE FROM medications WHERE patient_id = 1 AND dosage = '10mg';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM Medications WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals';
DELETE FROM AdverseEvents WHERE medication_id = 'c431eb5c-e5b5-4d37-a742-7c393869aad3' AND event_date < '2022-01-01';
